product_name: Fun Climbs: Red Rocks Topropes and Moderates
long_description: Providing thorough information on topropes and moderate sport climbs,. Author: Jason D. Martin. Softcover; 204 pages; black-and-white photographs; black-and-white maps and illustrations. Sharp End Publishing; copyright 2009. At-a-glance icons provide immediate information for every climb, including approach time, nature of the climb, suggested gear and seasonal information. Easy-to-read area maps help you locate individual climbs, and routes are overlayed on detailed photos. Each climb includes directions to and from the trailhead, author's personal rating out of 3 stars, standard rating and detailed, step-by-step description of the routes. Book is divided by single pitch and multipitch climbs.
short_description: Providing thorough information on topropes and moderate sport climbs, Fun Climbs: Red Rocks Topropes and Moderates will be your guide to this premier destination near Las Vegas, Nevada.
